LanguageData.Bullet_MoritaRifleBullet.label: morita bullet
LanguageData.SST_MoritaMK1CarbineGun.label: (SST) Morita MK1 (Carbine)
LanguageData.SST_MoritaMK1CarbineGun.description: A cut-down version of the Morita Mk1 rifle, this carbine version is chambered in .308 and features no under barrel shotgun making it less unwieldy. This is a favorite of Officers within the Mobile Infantry, and Navy personnel.
LanguageData.SST_MoritaMK1Gun.label: (SST) Morita Mk1
LanguageData.SST_MoritaMK1Gun.description: The standard rifle for the Federation. It's a fully automatic bullpup rifle chambered in .308 with an under barrel shotgun attached; a favorite within the Federation and standard-issue for the Mobile Infantry. Kill bugs!
LanguageData.SST_MoritaMK1Gun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.SST_MoritaMK1Gun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.SST_MoritaMK1Gun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: (SST) Morita Mk1
LanguageData.SST_MoritaMK1ScopedGun.label: (SST) Morita MK1 (Scoped)
LanguageData.SST_MoritaMK1ScopedGun.description: The standard rifle for the Federation. It is a fully automatic bullpup rifle chambered in 308. with an under barrel shotgun attached and a high powered scope, for precision bug-killing.
LanguageData.SST_MoritaMK1ScopedGun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.SST_MoritaMK3Gun.label: (SST) Morita Mk3
LanguageData.SST_MoritaMK3Gun.description: This beefed up and slightly larger version of the Morita is chambered in 10mm x 50 caseless ammunition, and wields an under barrel 30mm grenade launcher. Though it's even more unwieldy than the standard Morita, the Mk3 makes up for this with its massive punch; this is more common amongst Federal Marines, whereas the Mobile Infantry tends to stay with the Mk1.
LanguageData.SST_MoritaMK3Gun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.SST_MoritaMK3Gun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.SST_MoritaMK3Gun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: (SST) Morita Mk3
